question: Based on the given evidence, is the hypothesis 'Jack is either a trick-shot artist or bad at mid-range shots.' true, false, or uncertain? The final answer should be 'True', 'False', or 'Uncertain'. Only answer 'Uncertain' if the reasoning results from different evidences conflict with each other.

content.source_1: On Yale's varsity team, trick-shot artists do not struggle with half-court shots.
content.source_2: Every Yale varsity player either struggles with half-court shots or shoots a high percentage on 3-pointers.
content.source_3: Any Yale varsity player who shoots a high percentage on 3-pointers is solid at 2-pointers.
content.source_4: Any Yale varsity player who is solid at 2-pointers is not bad at mid-range shots.
content.source_5: Jack is a member of Yale's varsity team.
content.source_6: Jack is either a trick-shot artist or a high-percentage 3-point shooter.
content.source_7: On this team, trick-shot artists do not shoot a high percentage on 3-pointers.
content.source_8: On this team, some high-percentage 3-point shooters are bad at mid-range.
